    • Method Detail

      • validationError

        ValidationError validationError()
        Returns:
        ValidationError for rule object

      • check

        boolean check(java.lang.Object object)
       throws InvalidParametersException,
              java.io.InvalidClassException
        Simple rule check
        Parameters:
        object - Object that will be validated
        Returns:
        true if validation is passed, false if not
        Throws:
        InvalidParametersException - If parameters for rule are not correct InvalidParametersException is thrown
        java.io.InvalidClassException - If rule is not defined for class of object

      • isPassed

        boolean isPassed()
        Returns:
        true if validation is passed, false if not

      • canApplyToType

        boolean canApplyToType(java.lang.Class type)
        Parameters:
        type - type that will be checked
        Returns:
        true if type can be validated with rule, otherwise false

        boolean canApplyToObject(java.lang.Object object)
        Check if object can be validated with rule
        Parameters:

        Returns:
